#summary Usage of dtmsim.

== Command Line Usage ==

 $ dtmsim _[Rulefile]_ _[InputTape]_

 * _[Rulefile]_: A file representing the Turing machine to be simulated. See CreatingARulefile for the format of this file.
 * _[InputTape]_: The input tape to be used on this Turing machine. Tape cannot contain the character 'B', which is used for empty symbol.

== Note ==

See NotesAndDisclaimers.
